name: Bilderberg Landgoed Lauswolt

reviews.title: Zeer overgewaardeerd - highly overrated
reviews.text: Supposedly this is one of Hollands best hotels, but, apart from the awesome location, I struggle to find out why. It is very outdated and even though some elements are very nice, like the large rooms, great beds, nice bathrooms and luxury in the room all around, it has some weird stuff that I did not like.

The pool is very outdated, even dirty. It looks like a public pool and has no luxury at all, it is totally Eighties, and completely boring. There is weird towel service in the room, no idea why I would need 6 little towels per day in a little basket in front of my room. Staff is rude, or at least completely uninterested. Food seems to be michelin star level, but we found it obnoxious, little fingerfood that made no sense, and main courses that you could also find in the Van der Valks of this world.
reviews.title: Stay an enjoy a perfect wellness

reviews.text: We paid a fortune and we left with a feeling that we were ripped off.
reviews.title: Should have brought swimsuit and golf clubs

reviews.text: This hotel offers excellent service, outstanding restaurant an a perfect wellness. We enjoyed it seversl times for a long weekend! Ask the hotel for special festivities which will meka your stay even better. Last time we enjoyed the performance of classical music in the garden!
reviews.title: royal class

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel with my daughter as we were traveling in Friesland. I booked very last minute, a few hours before we arrived. I knew nothing about the hotel except that it was listed in a "Special Hotels" guide for the Netherlands.
reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant

description: Luxurious hotel in a beautiful country house on an attractive estate. Wellness facilities, awarded restaurant, swimmingpool next to a famous golf course.
